It has been detected that this mod was built for tModLoader v{0}

tModLoader.LoadErrorHashMismatchCorrupted: Hash mismatch, data blob has been modified or corrupted
tModLoader.LoadErrorDependencyVersionTooLow: {0} requires version {1} of {2} but version {3} is installed
tModLoader.LoadWarningBannerOrBannerItemNotSet: {0}: {1}. You have set ModNPC.banner or ModNPC.bannerItem, but not the other. Make sure you set both, check your spelling, and that the item exists if you are using mod.ItemType(). Report this to the {0} developers.
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNameEmpty: Mods must actually have stuff in their names
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNamedTerraria: Mods names cannot be named Terraria
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNameHasPeriod: A mod's internal name cannot contain a period
tModLoader.BuildErrorTwoModsSameName: Two mods share the internal name {0}
tModLoader.BuildErrorCompilingError: An error ocurred while compiling a mod.
tModLoader.BuildErrorModCompileFolderHint: It is likely that you didn't install correctly. Make sure you installed the ModCompile folder as well.
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNameDoesntMatchAssemblyName: Mod name {0} does not match assembly name {1}
tModLoader.BuildErrorNamespaceFolderDontMatch: Namespace and Folder name do not match. The top level namespace must match the folder name.
tModLoader.BuildErrorNoModClass: Make sure you have exactly one class extending Mod.
tModLoader.BuildErrorDotNet45forCS6: .NET Framework 4.5 must be installed to compile C# 6.0
tModLoader.BuildErrorPDBWindowsOnly: PDB files can only be generated for windows, on windows.

tModLoader.LoadError2ModItemSameName: You tried to add 2 ModItems with the same name: {0}. Maybe 2 classes share a classname but in different namespaces while autoloading or you manually called AddItem with 2 items of the same name.

tModLoader.MigratePlayersMessage:
You have no players.
If you'd like to migrate your players from vanilla to tModLoader,
please copy them from /Terraria/Players to /Terraria/ModLoader/Players.
Copy the .plr file and the similarly named folder over.
Click me to open those folders.
After copying over the players you want, press back.
tModLoader.MigrateWorldsMessage:
You have no worlds.
If you'd like to migrate your worlds from vanilla to tModLoader,
please copy them from /Terraria/Worlds to /Terraria/ModLoader/Worlds.
Copy the .wld file over.
Click me to open those folders.
After copying over the worlds you want, press back.
tModLoader.ModsDifferentSinceLastPlay: The following mods are different since last time you played:
tModLoader.ExtractHideCodeMessage: The modder has chosen to hide the code from tModReader.
tModLoader.ExtractNoSourceCodeMessage: The modder has not chosen to include their source code.
tModLoader.ExtractHideResourcesMessage: The modder has chosen to hide resources (ie. images) from tModReader.
